meanings.sent1: The mechanic will reboring the engine to fix the issue.
meanings.sent2: He decided to reboring the wood to make the hole larger.
meanings.sent3: The carpenter accidentally reboring the wrong side of the plank.
meanings.sent4: She felt like reboring her routine to add some excitement.
meanings.sent5: The idea of reboring the old well brought new life to the village.

meanings.definition: The act of boring a hole again.
meanings.sent1: The reboring of the pipe was necessary for proper water flow.
meanings.sent2: He observed the reboring of the metal with great interest.
meanings.sent3: The loud noise of reboring echoed through the workshop.
meanings.sent4: The reboring of the tunnel symbolized progress to the miners.
